data.text_level0: 看中国武术 有一种精神
data.kana_level0: Chinese martial arts have an inner spirit.

data.text_level0: 很明显不只是一个运动 后面有思想
data.kana_level0: Obviously, it is not only a kind of movement, but also thoughtful.

data.text_level0: 我的法语名字是Benjamin 变成中文本杰明
data.kana_level0: My French name is Benjamin, translated into Chinese is Ben Jieming.

data.text_level0: 来中国快5年了
data.kana_level0: I've been in China for almost 5 years.

data.text_level0: 在北京体育大学 武术与民族传统体育学院 今年刚毕业
data.kana_level0: I graduated from the institute of martial arts and ethnic traditional sports of Beijing Sport University this year.

data.text_level0: 大一的时候我每天早上6点起床 练那些翻跟头 倒立
data.kana_level0: When I was a freshman, I got up at 6 a.m. every day, to do some tumbling and handstand exercises.

data.text_level0: 后来我越练越发现我太喜欢运动了
data.kana_level0: The more I practiced, the more I found out that I enjoyed sports so much.

data.text_level0: 大概从15岁开始对武术有兴趣
data.kana_level0: I've been interested in martial arts since 15.

data.text_level0: 在国外一说武术 就会想到李小龙和少林和尚
data.kana_level0: When we mentioned martial arts abroad, we will think of Bruce Lee and Shaolin monks.

data.text_level0: 我第一次接触一个少林和尚 我看他表演
data.kana_level0: The first Shaolin monk I met, I watched his performance.

data.text_level0: 表演之前就他很自然笑 很放松
data.kana_level0: Before he performed, he smiled naturally and relaxed.

data.text_level0: 突然变得精神 突然 特别帅
data.kana_level0: Then he became energetic and handsome suddenly.

data.text_level0: 在法国那些老师 帮我联系北京体育大学
data.kana_level0: In France, some teachers helped me to contact the Beijing Sports University.

data.text_level0: 就有机会来这儿
data.kana_level0: So I had a chance to come here.

data.text_level0: 不怎么会说中文  我只会说  吃饭
data.kana_level0: I didn't know how to speak Chinese at that time. I could only say having a meal in Chinese.

data.text_level0: 学习中文一年  后来上本科
data.kana_level0: After learning Chinese for a year, I began to go to the university.

data.text_level0: 同学们每次问我怎么说我爱你 法文 然后他们一直说 je t'aime  je t'aime  je t'aime
data.kana_level0: My classmates always ask me how to say I love you in French, They always say that je t'aime  je t'aime  je t'aime.

data.text_level0: 每次见我就说
data.kana_level0: They will tell me every time when they see me.

data.text_level0: 我去一个推手交流会碰到了一个老师
data.kana_level0: I met a teacher at an exchange meeting of martial arts.

data.text_level0: 他叫汝继华临清潭腿门派的传人
data.kana_level0: His name is Ru Jihua, and he was a descendant of the school of Lin Qing Tan leg.

data.text_level0: 手臂产生支撑 背部产生推
data.kana_level0: The arms support, the back pushes.

data.text_level0: 在推与挂的瞬间  产生一个力量的攻击
data.kana_level0: By pushing and handing, a force bursts instantly.

data.text_level0: 我感觉被他完全控制了
data.kana_level0: I felt completely controlled by him.

data.text_level0: 有的时候我用力 我越用力 他把那个力量还给我
data.kana_level0: Sometimes the harder I tried, the more strongly he fought back.

data.text_level0: 我所练的这个拳种是  中国武术界史称  ”南拳北腿“
data.kana_level0: The kongfu I practice is known as "Southern First & Northern Kick" in Chinese martial arts.

data.text_level0: “北腿”的代表
data.kana_level0: The representative of the "Northern Kick".

data.text_level0: 师父慢点 我疼
data.kana_level0: Slow down, master, it hurts.

data.text_level0: 这个门派的特点就是腿部的力量 还有爆发力 主要是这两个特点
data.kana_level0: There are two main characteristics of this school, the strength of the legs and the explosive power of fighting.

data.text_level0: 他给我讲那么多 而且比较深的东西 虽然有很多的时候我听不懂 但是我还是感觉他的那种精神
data.kana_level0: He told me a lot of deep knowledge, I could feel his spirit even though I couldn't understand him a lot.

data.text_level0: 头有往前往上的趋势
data.kana_level0: Move your head forward and upward.

data.text_level0: 他当时的汉语水平不是很好 每次学拳讲到理论课的时候都是拿录音笔
data.kana_level0: He was not good at Chinese at that time, so he always took the recording pen in the theory class.

data.text_level0: 回去以后找他同学 放出来那个录音以后 让他同学来给他解释
data.kana_level0: When he went back, he put out the recording and asked his classmate to explain.

data.text_level0: 然后他同学听到理论知识以后呢 跟着他一起到这儿来练武
data.kana_level0: After hearing the theoretical knowledge, his classmate followed him to practice together.

data.text_level0: 当时他只是个大二的学生 看到他的时候 他正跟几个老师在进行武术交流
data.kana_level0: At that time, he was a sophomore, and when I saw him, he was exchanging martial arts experiences with several teachers.

data.text_level0: 杰明不懂推手的技术 有力不会使
data.kana_level0: Jie Ming didn't understand techniques of pushing hands in martial arts, and he couldn't make good use of it.

data.text_level0: 打的脸上了 吃了一些亏
data.kana_level0: So he was hit in the face and suffered some losses.

data.text_level0: 但是打动我的事就是这个
data.kana_level0: But what touched me was that.

data.text_level0: 他不但没有还手 他连骂都没骂
data.kana_level0: Instead of hitting back, he didn't even scold.

data.text_level0: 他很自然 哟老师 您这功夫很好
data.kana_level0: He said naturally. "Teacher, you are good at kung fu."

data.text_level0: 我就觉得这个孩子品质上非常好
data.kana_level0: I thought this boy was very good.

data.text_level0: 我这个人比较直 我就有点看不下去了 所以我跟他说 你要是想了解中国武术 可以去找我
data.kana_level0: I was a little bit direct, I couldn't stand it anymore, so I told him that if you wanted to know about Chinese martial arts, you could learn from me.

data.text_level0: 从那以后到现在一直跟着我们在一起 一直在训练
我的动作当时还不是很标准
data.kana_level0: At that time, my movements were not standard.

data.text_level0: 在很简单的动作我放松了
data.kana_level0: I was relaxed in a simple movement.

data.text_level0: 里面我感觉有东西好像坏了
data.kana_level0: I felt that something inside was broken,

data.text_level0: 每天早上我起来 我整个身体疼得不行
data.kana_level0: and so much painful every morning when I got up.

data.text_level0: 去年12月份的时候去医院检查 我发现很严重
data.kana_level0: When I went to the hospital for examination in December last year, I found that I was injured badly.

data.text_level0: 通过中医 需要六个月一年的过程
data.kana_level0: It would take 6 months to a year to get treatment through traditional Chinese medicine.

data.text_level0: 每周我去做一些针灸和手法
data.kana_level0: I do the acupuncture and massage every week now.

data.text_level0: 针灸真的很厉害
data.kana_level0: The acupuncture is really strong.

data.text_level0: 我以前我的肩膀也受过伤 那个肌腱 差不多断了
data.kana_level0: I had a tendon injury on my shoulder before, and it was almost broken.

data.text_level0: 后来我去见他两次 差不多就好很多
data.kana_level0: Then I went to see him twice and almost recovered.

data.text_level0: 每个东西要是专业练需要花很多时间
data.kana_level0: It takes a lot of time to train professionally.

data.text_level0: 这六个月都没有以前练得多
data.kana_level0: In these 6 months I haven't practiced as much as before.

data.text_level0: 一直要坚持
data.kana_level0: I should keep practicing from now on.

data.text_level0: 以后我想开一个训练馆 不一定要高水平 让人觉得他们也可以做原来想不到能做的动作
data.kana_level0: Later I want to open a training hall, which doesn't have to be professional, just to let people feel that they can also do unexpected movements.
